questionList.content:
如图,点$C$,$E$,$B$,$F$在一条直线上,$A$$B$⊥$C$$F$于点$B$,$D$$E$⊥$C$$F$于点$E$,$A$$C$=$D$$F$,$A$$B$=$D$$E$.求证:$C$$E$=$B$$F$.
[myImgCur]
questionList.answer: 证明:∵$A$$B$⊥$C$$F$,$D$$E$⊥$C$$F$,∴$\angle$$A$$B$$C$=$\angle$$D$$E$$F$=90°.在$R$$t$$\triangle$$A$$B$$C$和$R$$t$$\triangle$$D$$E$$F$中,$\left\{\begin{array}{l}A C=D F, \\ A B=D E,\end{array}\right.$,∴$R$$t$$\triangle$$A$$B$$C$≌$R$$t$$\triangle$$D$$E$$F$($H$$L$).∴$B$$C$=$E$$F$.∴$B$$C$-$B$$E$=$E$$F$-$B$$E$,即$C$$E$=$B$$F$.

questionList.content: 求$A$$C$的长;
questionList.answer: $\because \angle C=90^{\circ}, \angle B=30^{\circ}, A B=2 \sqrt{3}, \therefore A C=\frac{1}{2} A B=\sqrt{3}$.
questionList.analysis: 【解析】$\because \angle C=90^{\circ}, \angle B=30^{\circ}, A B=2 \sqrt{3}, \therefore A C=\frac{1}{2} A B=\sqrt{3}$.
questionList.knowName: 用勾股定理解三角形,点到直线的距离
questionList.dataContent:
如图,在$R$$t$△$A$$B$$C$中,$\angle C={{90}^{\circ }},\angle B={{30}^{\circ }},AB=2\sqrt{3},$$A$$D$是$ABC$的角平分线.
[myImgCur]

materialQuestionList.answer: $\because \angle C=90^{\circ}, \angle B=30^{\circ}, A B=2 \sqrt{3}, \therefore A C=\frac{1}{2} A B=\sqrt{3}$.
materialQuestionList.analysis: 【解析】$\because \angle C=90^{\circ}, \angle B=30^{\circ}, A B=2 \sqrt{3}, \therefore A C=\frac{1}{2} A B=\sqrt{3}$.

materialQuestionList.answer: 过点$D$作$D$$E$⊥$A$$B$于点$E$.∵$A$$D$是$\triangle$$A$$B$$C$的角平分线,$\angle$$C$=90°,$D$$E$⊥$A$$B$,∴$D$$E$$=DC,\angle CAD=\frac{1}{2}\angle CAB=\frac{1}{2}\times \left( {{90}^{\circ }}-{{30}^{\circ }} \right)={{30}^{\circ }},\therefore AD=2CD,\because A{{C}^{\circ }}$$C{{D}^{2}}=A{{D}^{2}},\therefore {{\left( \sqrt{3} \right)}^{2}}+C{{D}^{2}}={{\left( 2CD \right)}^{2}},$解得$C$$D$=1(负值舍去).∴$D$$E$=$C$$D$=1.∴点$D$到$A$$B的距离为1.
materialQuestionList.analysis:
【解析】过点$D$作$D$$E$⊥$A$$B$于点$E$.∵$A$$D$是$\triangle$$A$$B$$C$的角平分线,$\angle$$C$=90°,$D$$E$⊥$A$$B$,∴$D$$E$$=DC,\angle CAD=\frac{1}{2}\angle CAB=\frac{1}{2}\times \left( {{90}^{\circ }}-{{30}^{\circ }} \right)={{30}^{\circ }},\therefore AD=2CD,\because A{{C}^{\circ }}$$C{{D}^{2}}=A{{D}^{2}},\therefore {{\left( \sqrt{3} \right)}^{2}}+C{{D}^{2}}={{\left( 2CD \right)}^{2}},$解得$C$$D$=1(负值舍去).∴$D$$E$=$C$$D$=1.∴点$D$到$A$$B的距离为1.
<!!>

questionList.content: 求△$A$$B$$C$的周长;
questionList.answer: $\because A C=6 cm, A B=8 cm, \therefore B C=\sqrt{A C^2+A B^2}=\sqrt{6^2+8^2}=$$10(cm) . \therefore \triangle A B C$的周长为$A C+A B+B C=6+8+10=24(cm)$．
questionList.analysis: 【解析】$\because A C=6 cm, A B=8 cm, \therefore B C=\sqrt{A C^2+A B^2}=\sqrt{6^2+8^2}=$$10(cm) . \therefore \triangle A B C$的周长为$A C+A B+B C=6+8+10=24(cm)$．
questionList.knowName: 用勾股定理解三角形
questionList.dataContent:
如图，有一张直角三角形纸片，两直角边.$AC=6cm,AB=8cm,$将△$ABC$折叠，使点$B$与点$C$重合，折痕为$D$$E$.
[myImgCur]

materialQuestionList.answer: $\because A C=6 cm, A B=8 cm, \therefore B C=\sqrt{A C^2+A B^2}=\sqrt{6^2+8^2}=$$10(cm) . \therefore \triangle A B C$的周长为$A C+A B+B C=6+8+10=24(cm)$．
materialQuestionList.analysis: 【解析】$\because A C=6 cm, A B=8 cm, \therefore B C=\sqrt{A C^2+A B^2}=\sqrt{6^2+8^2}=$$10(cm) . \therefore \triangle A B C$的周长为$A C+A B+B C=6+8+10=24(cm)$．

materialQuestionList.answer: 依题意，得$\angle D E C=\angle D E B=90^{\circ}, D C=B D, C E=B E=5 cm$，在 Rt$\triangle C A D$中，$A C^2+A D^2=C D^2, \therefore 6^2+(8-D B)^2=D B^2 . \therefore D B=\frac{25}{4} cm . \therefore D E=$$\sqrt{D B^2-B E^2}=\sqrt{\left(\frac{25}{4}\right)^2-5^2}=\frac{15}{4}(cm)$.
materialQuestionList.analysis:
【解析】依题意，得$\angle D E C=\angle D E B=90^{\circ}, D C=B D, C E=B E=5 cm$，在 Rt$\triangle C A D$中，$A C^2+A D^2=C D^2, \therefore 6^2+(8-D B)^2=D B^2 . \therefore D B=\frac{25}{4} cm . \therefore D E=$$\sqrt{D B^2-B E^2}=\sqrt{\left(\frac{25}{4}\right)^2-5^2}=\frac{15}{4}(cm)$.
<!!>

questionList.content: 如图2，将仪器放置在△$ABC$上,使点$O$与顶点$A$重合,$D$,$E$分别在边$A$$B$,$A$$C$上,沿$A$$F$画一条射线$A$$P$,交$B$$C$于点$P$.$A$$P$是$\angle BAC$的平分线吗?请判断并说明理由；
questionList.answer: $A P$是$\angle B A C$的平分线．理由如下：在$\triangle A D F$和$\triangle A E F$中，$\left\{\begin{array}{l}A D=A E, \\ F D=F E, \therefore \triangle A D F \cong \triangle A E F( SSS ) . \\ A F=A F,\end{array}\right.$$\therefore \angle D A F=\angle E A F . \therefore A P$平分$\angle B A C$.
questionList.analysis: 【解析】$A P$是$\angle B A C$的平分线．理由如下：在$\triangle A D F$和$\triangle A E F$中，$\left\{\begin{array}{l}A D=A E, \\ F D=F E, \therefore \triangle A D F \cong \triangle A E F( SSS ) . \\ A F=A F,\end{array}\right.$$\therefore \angle D A F=\angle E A F . \therefore A P$平分$\angle B A C$.

图1 是一个平分角的仪器，其中$OD=OE,FD=FE.$

materialQuestionList.content: 如图2，将仪器放置在△$ABC$上,使点$O$与顶点$A$重合,$D$,$E$分别在边$A$$B$,$A$$C$上,沿$A$$F$画一条射线$A$$P$,交$B$$C$于点$P$.$A$$P$是$\angle BAC$的平分线吗?请判断并说明理由；
materialQuestionList.answer: $A P$是$\angle B A C$的平分线．理由如下：在$\triangle A D F$和$\triangle A E F$中，$\left\{\begin{array}{l}A D=A E, \\ F D=F E, \therefore \triangle A D F \cong \triangle A E F( SSS ) . \\ A F=A F,\end{array}\right.$$\therefore \angle D A F=\angle E A F . \therefore A P$平分$\angle B A C$.
materialQuestionList.analysis: 【解析】$A P$是$\angle B A C$的平分线．理由如下：在$\triangle A D F$和$\triangle A E F$中，$\left\{\begin{array}{l}A D=A E, \\ F D=F E, \therefore \triangle A D F \cong \triangle A E F( SSS ) . \\ A F=A F,\end{array}\right.$$\therefore \angle D A F=\angle E A F . \therefore A P$平分$\angle B A C$.
materialQuestionList.knowName: 角平分线的有关计算,利用相似三角形的性质求解

materialQuestionList.content: 在第一问题的条件下,过点$P$作$P Q \perp A B$于点$Q$，若$F$$PQ=6,AC=9,△ABC$的面积是 60,求$A$$B$的长.
materialQuestionList.answer: 过点$P$作$P G \perp A C$于点$G . \because A P$平分$\angle B A C, P Q \perp A B, \therefore P G$$\begin{aligned}  =P Q=6 . \because S_{\triangle A B C}=S_{\triangle A B P}+S_{\triangle A P C}=\frac{1}{2} A B \cdot P Q+\frac{1}{2} A C \cdot P G, \therefore \frac{1}{2} A B  \times 6+\frac{1}{2} \times 9 \times 6=60 . \therefore A B=11 .\end{aligned}$
materialQuestionList.analysis:
【解析】过点$P$作$P G \perp A C$于点$G . \because A P$平分$\angle B A C, P Q \perp A B, \therefore P G$$\begin{aligned}  =P Q=6 . \because S_{\triangle A B C}=S_{\triangle A B P}+S_{\triangle A P C}=\frac{1}{2} A B \cdot P Q+\frac{1}{2} A C \cdot P G, \therefore \frac{1}{2} A B  \times 6+\frac{1}{2} \times 9 \times 6=60 . \therefore A B=11 .\end{aligned}$
<!!>
materialQuestionList.knowName: 三角形中位线与三角形面积问题

questionList.content: 试求∠$D$$A$$E$的度数;
questionList.answer: $\because$在$\triangle A B C$中，$\angle B A C=90^{\circ}, A B=A C, \therefore \angle B=\angle A C B=45^{\circ} . \because B D$$=B A, C E=C A, \therefore \angle B A D=\left(180^{\circ}-45^{\circ}\right) \div 2=67.5^{\circ}, \angle C A E=45^{\circ} \div 2=22$．$5^{\circ} . \therefore \angle D A E=90^{\circ}-\angle B A D+\angle C A E=45^{\circ}$．
questionList.analysis: 【解析】$\because$在$\triangle A B C$中，$\angle B A C=90^{\circ}, A B=A C, \therefore \angle B=\angle A C B=45^{\circ} . \because B D$$=B A, C E=C A, \therefore \angle B A D=\left(180^{\circ}-45^{\circ}\right) \div 2=67.5^{\circ}, \angle C A E=45^{\circ} \div 2=22$．$5^{\circ} . \therefore \angle D A E=90^{\circ}-\angle B A D+\angle C A E=45^{\circ}$．
questionList.knowName: 根据平行线的性质求角的度数,角的度数大小比较
questionList.dataContent:
如图,在△$A$$B$$C$中,$\angle BAC={{90}^{\circ }},AB=AC,$点$D$在$B$$C$上,且$BD=BA,$点$E$在$B$$C$的延长线上,且$C$$E$=$C$$A$.
[myImgCur]

materialQuestionList.answer: $\because$在$\triangle A B C$中，$\angle B A C=90^{\circ}, A B=A C, \therefore \angle B=\angle A C B=45^{\circ} . \because B D$$=B A, C E=C A, \therefore \angle B A D=\left(180^{\circ}-45^{\circ}\right) \div 2=67.5^{\circ}, \angle C A E=45^{\circ} \div 2=22$．$5^{\circ} . \therefore \angle D A E=90^{\circ}-\angle B A D+\angle C A E=45^{\circ}$．
materialQuestionList.analysis: 【解析】$\because$在$\triangle A B C$中，$\angle B A C=90^{\circ}, A B=A C, \therefore \angle B=\angle A C B=45^{\circ} . \because B D$$=B A, C E=C A, \therefore \angle B A D=\left(180^{\circ}-45^{\circ}\right) \div 2=67.5^{\circ}, \angle C A E=45^{\circ} \div 2=22$．$5^{\circ} . \therefore \angle D A E=90^{\circ}-\angle B A D+\angle C A E=45^{\circ}$．
materialQuestionList.knowName: 根据平行线的性质求角的度数

materialQuestionList.content: 如果把原题中“$A$$B$=$A$$C$”的条件去掉，其余条件不变，那么$\angle DAE$的度数会改变吗?为什么?
materialQuestionList.answer: 不变．理由如下：$\angle D A E=$$90^{\circ}-\frac{180^{\circ}-\angle B}{2}+\frac{1}{2} \angle A C B=\frac{1}{2}(\angle B+\angle A C B)=45^{\circ}$．从上式可看出当$A B$和$A C$不相等时，$\angle B+\angle A C B$也是定值为$90^{\circ} . \therefore \angle D A E$的度数不变．
materialQuestionList.analysis: 【解析】不变．理由如下：$\angle D A E=$$90^{\circ}-\frac{180^{\circ}-\angle B}{2}+\frac{1}{2} \angle A C B=\frac{1}{2}(\angle B+\angle A C B)=45^{\circ}$．从上式可看出当$A B$和$A C$不相等时，$\angle B+\angle A C B$也是定值为$90^{\circ} . \therefore \angle D A E$的度数不变．<!!>

questionList.analysis: 【解析】证明:∵$\triangle$$O$$D$$C$和$\triangle$$E$$B$$C$都是等边三角形,∴$O$$C$=$D$$C$,$B$$C$=$C$$E$,$\angle$$O$$C$$D$=$\angle$$B$$C$$E$=60°.∴$\angle$$O$$C$$D$+$\angle$$B$$C$$D$=$\angle$$B$$C$$E$+$\angle$$B$$C$$D$,即$\angle$$E$$C$$D$=$\angle$$B$$C$$O$.∴$\triangle$$D$$E$$C$≌$\triangle$$O$$B$$C$($S$$A$$S$).∴$D$$E$=$O$$B$.
questionList.knowName: 等边三角形的判定和性质,等边三角形的性质
questionList.dataContent:
如图1,已知点$B$(0,6),点$C$为$x$轴上一动点,连接$B$$C$,△$O$$D$$C$和△$E$$B$$C$都是等边三角形.
[myImgCur]

materialQuestionList.analysis: 【解析】证明:∵$\triangle$$O$$D$$C$和$\triangle$$E$$B$$C$都是等边三角形,∴$O$$C$=$D$$C$,$B$$C$=$C$$E$,$\angle$$O$$C$$D$=$\angle$$B$$C$$E$=60°.∴$\angle$$O$$C$$D$+$\angle$$B$$C$$D$=$\angle$$B$$C$$E$+$\angle$$B$$C$$D$,即$\angle$$E$$C$$D$=$\angle$$B$$C$$O$.∴$\triangle$$D$$E$$C$≌$\triangle$$O$$B$$C$($S$$A$$S$).∴$D$$E$=$O$$B$.

materialQuestionList.content:
如图2,当点$D$恰好落在$B$$C$上时.
①求$O$$C$的长及点$E$的坐标;
②在$x$轴上是否存在点$P$，使△$P$$E$$C$为等腰三角形?若存在，写出点$P$的坐标；若不存在，说明理由；
③如图3,$M$是线段$B$$C$上的动点(点$B$,$C$除外),过点$M$作$M$$G$⊥$B$$E$于点$G$,$M$$H$⊥$C$$E$于点$H$，当点$M$运动时，$M$$H$+$M$$G$的值是否发生变化?若不会变化，直接写出$M$$H$+$M$$G$的值；若会变化，简要说明理由.
materialQuestionList.answer: ①∵$\triangle$$O$$D$$C$是等边三角形,∴$\angle$$O$$C$$B$=60°.∵$\angle$$B$$O$$C$=90°,∴$\angle$$O$$B$$C$=30°.设$O$$C$=$x$,则$B$$C$=2$x$.∴在$R$$t$$\triangle$$O$$B$$C$中,${{x}^{2}}+{{6}^{2}}={{\left( 2x \right)}^{2}},$解得$x=2\sqrt{3},\therefore OC=2\sqrt{3},BC=4\sqrt{3},\because$$\triangle$$E$$B$$C$是等边三角形，∴$B$$E$=$B$$C$=4$\sqrt{3}$,$\angle$$C$$B$$E$=60°.∴$\angle$$O$$B$$E$=$\angle$$O$$B$$C$$+\angle CBE={{90}^{\circ }}.\therefore E\left( 4\sqrt{3}\text{,}6 \right).$.②点$P$的坐标为$\left( -2\sqrt{3}\text{,}0 \right)$或$\left( 6\sqrt{3}\text{,}0 \right).$③不会变化,$M$$H$+$M$$G$=6.
materialQuestionList.analysis:
【解析】①∵$\triangle$$O$$D$$C$是等边三角形,∴$\angle$$O$$C$$B$=60°.∵$\angle$$B$$O$$C$=90°,∴$\angle$$O$$B$$C$=30°.设$O$$C$=$x$,则$B$$C$=2$x$.∴在$R$$t$$\triangle$$O$$B$$C$中,${{x}^{2}}+{{6}^{2}}={{\left( 2x \right)}^{2}},$解得$x=2\sqrt{3},\therefore OC=2\sqrt{3},BC=4\sqrt{3},\because$$\triangle$$E$$B$$C$是等边三角形，∴$B$$E$=$B$$C$=4$\sqrt{3}$,$\angle$$C$$B$$E$=60°.∴$\angle$$O$$B$$E$=$\angle$$O$$B$$C$$+\angle CBE={{90}^{\circ }}.\therefore E\left( 4\sqrt{3}\text{,}6 \right).$.②点$P$的坐标为$\left( -2\sqrt{3}\text{,}0 \right)$或$\left( 6\sqrt{3}\text{,}0 \right).$③不会变化,$M$$H$+$M$$G$=6.
<!!>
materialQuestionList.knowName: 等边三角形的判定和性质

paperName: 名校课堂-数学(北师大版)八年级下册-单元测试(1)三角形的证明
